data.name: Cat Gets Medieval
data.detailed_description:
Other games from Letmeowt Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1790360/Grand_Theft_Gato_Vice_Kitty/?beta=0
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1444320/Cat_Saves_Halloween/


About the Game

Tired of two-legged adventures? How about a four-legged one? Bring your friends for up to 16 legs! Come! Climb over the walls of a castle or up the pants-legs of the local humans. Yarf hairballs at people! Or delve a dungeon for treasure and emerge shooting fireballs from your mouth or maybe darkness lasers from your eyes! Did we mention that the kingdom is in danger and its up to you to find the 6 pieces of broken crown to save the land from plunging into darkness? The fur will fly as you, cat-hero, take on the baddies with claws, wits, and magical items.

Explore new lands, solve their problems, or cause some of your own. It’s all open to you in this cat-tastic purrtacular adventure!


Key Features
  • Quest and explore a huge interactive open world
  • Delve the depths of crypts, caves, dungeons, and abandoned fortresses for lost artifacts
  • Each character can access unique powerful artifacts that aligns with their elements
  • Character progression and development to improve your strength, health and magic
  • Tons of quests and interactive characters

data.short_description: Explore an amazing fantasy world as a magical cat! Solve problems or create them! Save the kingdom from the evil forces! Co-op with friends!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
